Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[RoadBuilder.R: Сохраняет только те дороги, которые были использованы в сохраненной игре, в локальную папку вашего компьютера.
Ignores safety restrictions when displaying lanes in the lane list panel.
Ignores various safety restrictions on when creating a road.
Отключает стрелки на миниатюрах сгенерированных дорог.
Options.OPTION[RoadBuilder.RoadBuilder.M: Создавать новые полосы движения всегда с параметрами по умолчанию
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[RoadBuilder.R: При перетаскивании новых полос движения всегда будут использоваться параметры полосы движения по умолчанию вместо копирования настроек ближайшей полосы движения.
Determines the hot-key to activate the Road Builder tool.
Allows editing and using roads that are currently locked in your city's development tree.
Determines the hot-key to start placing the road you are currently editing.
Options.OPTION[RoadBuilder.RoadBuilder.M: Remove automatic sides on tunnels and bridges.
Options.OPTION_DESCRIPTION[RoadBuilder.R: Allows road creation without tunnel or bridge sides if no shoulder or sidewalk is added to the edge.
RoadBuilder.DIALOG_MESSAGE[DELETE]: Are you sure you want to delete this road? This will remove any placed segments in your city that uses it.
RoadBuilder.DIALOG_MESSAGE[ReloadSave]: This city contains roads that you did not have already. Reload this save-game immediately, without closing the game, so your changes to intersections are not lost.
RoadBuilder.RoadAddon[RequiresUpgradeFor: Requires Electricty Upgrade To Pass Electricty
RoadBuilder.Warning[MissingEdgeLane]: Not having a Shoulder or Sidewalk lane on this edge may result in unexpected behaviour.
RoadBuilder.FindTooltip: Find where this road is placed on the map
RoadBuilder.DeleteTooltip: Delete this road configuration and any segments on the map that use it
RoadBuilder.Name: Имя
